channel.title: Copper and Aluminum Redox Reaction
channel.description: Can anyone on this forum write and balance the Redox reaction for copper and aluminum in an acidic situation. I really have no idea what I'm doing so far and my teacher just threw this project electro chemistry at the last second.

item.title: Copper and Aluminum Redox Reaction
item.dc:creator: @Rictoo Rictoo
item.description:
@Rictoo wrote:

We know that Cu -> Cu2+ + 2 e- and that 2 Ag+ + 2 e- -> 2 Ag. Adding and canceling the resulting electrons gives us Cu + 2 Ag+ -> Cu2+ 2 Ag. The copper is being oxidized and the silver is being reduced.

Read full topic
